availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ben Duke (Louisville, Ky, freedman and barber)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, barber. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Duke. Father of Charles Duke, Emma Duke, and James Duke. Married to Sarah Duke. Father of William H. Duke and Lucy Duke. Barber in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Cackman in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville District 1, p. 126A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 3, p. 624.
